P117377.project_name: Prevention and Management of Influenza Type Illness and Strengthening of Argentina's Epidemiological System Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Prevention and Management of Influenza Type Illness and Strengthening of Argentina's Epidemiological System Project will contribute to the nation's higher-level objective of reducing its burden of disease related to infectious and transmitted diseases, specifically acute respiratory infections, by improving the Expanded Program on Immunization (EPI) program and its epidemiological surveillance system for the prevention and control of influenza related illness. The loan will help Argentina's effort to monitor, prevent, and control the A/H1N1 influenza pandemic, which hit Argentina in May of this year and has caused more than 600 fatalities. The project will finance costs associated with the first outbreak, as well as costs associated with preparing the country for a second wave of the pandemic. The project will support the Government to: strengthen the capacity of Argentina's epidemiological health surveillance system: (a) to prevent, monitor and evaluate influenza activity, and (b) to control epidemic waves of A/H1N1 influenza.

P117377.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectAbstract>El Proyecto de emergencia para la prevención y atención de enfermedades tipo influenza de Argentina contribuirá al cumplimiento del objetivo de nivel superior de la nación: reducir la cantidad de enfermos relacionados con enfermedades infecciosas y transmisibles, específicamente las infecciones respiratorias agudas, mejorando el programa extendido de inmunización y el sistema de supervisión epidemiológica para la prevención y el control de enfermedades relacionadas con la influenza. El proyecto fortalecerá la capacidad del sistema de supervisión epidemiológica de Argentina: a) para prevenir, supervisar y evaluar la actividad de la influenza y b) para controlar las oleadas epidémicas de influenza A/H1N1.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
